attributes.action: All PCV licence holders to be able to get a PCO licence automatically
attributes.additional_details: It seems logical to allow people who transport huge amounts of people to be able to transport people in a car.
attributes.background: PCV licence is short for Passenger carrying vehicles, if we can transport more than 16 passengers in a bus we should be able to drive a car with passengers in it and get paid.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about requirements and licensing for private hire vehicle drivers are a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
